ComicInfo.Summary:
“THE TALKIES”
Hit-Girl’s on set—watching her life portrayed by America’s sweetheart. She needs to axe this film, and fast. Everyone knows if you want to kill a snake, you cut off its head. So Hit-Girl’s heading to Hollywood’s viper nest: The Black Tower.

ComicInfo.Title: The Golden Rage of Hollywood Part Two: The Talkies
